product_name: Quiksilver Koloa Bamboo Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's
long_description: Built with sun-protective mesh fabric infused with bamboo charcoal to minimize odors, the Quiksilver Koloa Bamboo Long-Sleeve Shirt offers great sun protection both in and out of the water. Flatlock stitching minimizes chafing and a stash pocket on lower back stores small extras. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric keeps you comfortable while playing in the water. Board-short loop fastener; UPF 40; loose fit.
short_description: Built with sun-protective mesh fabric infused with bamboo charcoal to minimize odors, the Quiksilver Koloa Bamboo Long-Sleeve Shirt offers great sun protection both in and out of the water.
